replies.body:
Hot issues with 7.24 Patch (Updated December 15, 2017 @ 9 AM PT):

- Some players are unable to use their Essence Collector Ward.  It is still in your inventory!  **This should now be resolved!**
- Some players on EU have reported their Mastery not updating or earning a token after a match.  The issue has been reported to interested teams.  **This should now be resolved!**

- Mac players using an older version of their OS cannot patch.  Updating to the most recent version should resolve this:

> Software Update steps:
> - Click the Apple icon on the top left of the screen, click on "About This Mac", and choose "Software Update..."
> - The App store will open and display any software updates available for OS X and the App Store. OS X updates will be at the top of the list.
> - Click "Update All" to install all available software updates. If prompted, enter an admin name and password, then your Apple ID and password
> If required, restart your system.

We'd also like to investigate the issue further as a whole.  It would help a lot to grab some logs from our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  
-

Hey um i got a leaverbuster when my internet went out and i dcd, but the slow 20min que keeps resetting when it goes below 10minutes, i have been waiting to play for over an hour and dont know what to do, HELP :/

TL;DR: Normally don't have an issue, 7.24 dropped my FPS, randomly disconnecting with internet still active, not sure what the issue is. pls halpppppp

Hi. Since this patch (7.24), I have had major FPS issues. I run League with no other applications running. I've checked countless times to make sure no other application is taking up any of my PC to an extent that it would effect gameplay. I've run CCleaner countless times, checked pretty much everything I could that would effect gameplay and PC issues, and have found nothing. My laptop's specs are Intel(R) Core i5-4200H CPU @ 2.80GHz. My GPU is INTEL HD Graphics 4600 and my GPU 1 is NVIDIA GeForce 840M. 
I normally get around 140-160 FPS unless I'm running multiple data-hog apps (like Chrome windows) and in that case, I generally get around 80. Now I'm getting around 70 normally and dropping to as low as 17 during fights with no other apps open and all apps in Task Manager that I don't need disabled. 
I've also been having issues where I will be normal ping (for me, around 49ms) and will just disconnect at random. I know this is mainly on my end - Spectrum being the culprit - but I have been losing games because this has been happening since the new patch. 
The reason I mention that, though, is because there are many times where my internet isn't down, yet I am disconnected from League. I've done everything I can on my end. In regards to the FPS issue, I've also lowered my in-game settings to medium-low. I've tried capping my frame rate but it hasn't done anything. 
I pretty much exclusively play ranked, so this is an issue for me. I'm in Platinum but I'll randomly lose games because either my FPS drops out of nowhere or I just disconnect at crucial points in the game.
I've also run a system repair but no corruption has shown up.
I have had the same problem this patch, makes the game unbearable to play. Riot has yet to address this issue.
So uhhhh wheres the Essence collector ward that I bought hmmmmm???
It's currently a bug!  :(  They're still on your account, but an issue is preventing players from seeing or using it right now.
so what about the fps problems for high end computers that i have been having for the last two month i start the game with 80-100 fps less then what im use too?

Riot JxE is currently collecting information to look at FPS issues in this[ pinned thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lZv6E2Xz-update-on-fps-issues-in-722-and-723).  Aside from that, our[ high specs guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs)might be able to help.  In many cases, simply capping your framerate via in-game video options can resolve the issue.
why would i cap my frames the game isnt even putting a load out at all or even trying is the problem
im use to floating 280 to 200 fps all day no problem why would i set it to worst then what im use too...

i have had a issue with fps since the end of ranked season and i have the hardware to push it easy gtx1080 and 7820hk i7 its the only game that sucks to play right now its no fun getting 80-40 fps in team fights when your use to a straight 200 fps uncapped
I've been having issues connecting a game on time it usually says network error and I have to re-start my client entirely making me late for the game is there anyway to fix this?
I have the similar issue instead the game just doesn't load and my teammates had to rematch also people report me for AFK.
I never connected it says "game still in progress..." I have reset my client several time but  still has not helped.
me 2 bro
me too wtf!! cant play even co op since the last patch
same. it started to happen since the recent update. and I've tried restarting the game, restarting my mac several times, none of them worked. it disconnects me every time.

i`m not AFK but i lost my connection
why my acc had low priority queue ?
so sad
{{champion:222}}

Your account can get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after a history of leaving games (not just 1 game). Even though it was not intentional, it's going to treat all players equally because it still causes others a bad experience.  If you're regularly losing connection with the game server, then the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help!  Just be sure to try it in a custom game first to not escalate your lower priority queue.

No. it's THIS GAME that causes others a bad experience, not me. I ran the connection issues guide and my internet works great. I don't think I should take the responsibility of someone else's fault. 
This game has been disconnecting me from every single game I tried to play since this new update. I had wasted my 3 hours on trying to find a solution for it and now I'm punished because the game won't work?? It doesn't sound fair.
i got the same problem dude since the LAST PATCH. cant even playing a custom game. it laags and disconect.
it kept disconnect me this entire afternoon and now i have low priority queue. the punishment always comes earlier than the solution.
u had lag in game right ? i had 700 - 1000 ms :D
me 2 :(

hi i have really good internet but 2 days ago it become so lagggy over 300ms  normal is 78ms, but if i try different wifi it work fine . so i cant find where is the problem  .
HELP ME

Sounds like that specific wifi could be having either router or ISP issues.  Your best bet may be to try a wired connection, but see if [configuring DNS ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)might help as well.
Hi, my screen goes black after I start a game. I have a MacBook Air. I just spent $75 dollars on the game for Christmas so it will be really frustrating if it doesn't work anymore.

Sorry to hear about the trouble.  :(  This black screen is usually caused by a network problem struggling to get to the game server, so it can't download assets and remains a black screen.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix that up.
Couldn't login ?
i cant login to lol anymore my password is good

So this is frustating but over the last 2-3 days, i've been getting a lot of packet drops with high ping spikes, high jitter. sometimes i can't even load into a game unless i close the entire game/client then reboot the game.  usually puts me 2-3 minutes behind, making it impossible for my team to win* or comeback when they have to tr fighting 4v5 or 3v5 in some cases where im not the only one unable to connect.  I used the HTR tool and it didnt solve the issue, and now im running a full client repair.  If that doesn't work I can only assume its your server or my ISP that just doesnt want to connect to you server.

I'm yet to see any useful post regarding this sort of problem
Will this: Asus K53U with CPU : AMD Dual Core C-50/ 2 GB Ram/ 320 Gb / 1.00 Ghz with HD 6250M Graphics work at Medium Graphics with min 30 fps ?

i have a prb with downloading the data with the launcher every time i close it and open it again it just re download every thing again from 2.13 GB can i download the game data from utorrent if ya pls give me a link 4 it ty :3

I am starting to get flickering line acorss my screen when i start the game and when i pull open the scoreborard or the buy items tab. I am also experiencing high cpu usage for some reason. If anyone knows why it would help greatly thanks.
Suppose I'll just have to wait for it to finish. Maybe I'll finally play again tonight! Instead of watching my brother play on his laptop.
Looks like leaving it alone has it slowly advancing in percentage...
The little patcher that could!

I actually have a bizarre problem - I'm trying to update the game, but everytime the update hits 1%, it suddenly swaps to "Applying Patches" for a split second, then the download size gets even bigger, and never leaves 3628.2mb left to download... It's driving me crazy, as I've wanted to play League again for months. If there's any way I can get some help, I'd truly appreciate it.

Hey there, what happens if you just leave it alone?  Sometimes the patcher will show a massive file size while it's reading through game files already installed, so it's kind of a visual bug.  Otherwise, everything should patch okay unless you're running into any errors.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BAZr94WR,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2017-12-22T23:15:29.263+0000)
>
> Hey there, what happens if you just leave it alone?  Sometimes the patcher will show a massive file size while it's reading through game files already installed, so it's kind of a visual bug.  Otherwise, everything should patch okay unless you're running into any errors.

I suppose I'll give that a try. Though the bug seems to be that it wants to hang up on that particular area of mb. It'll occasionally shift to 3627.5, but then right back up. Hm...

So I just patched today, I don't play very often but last patch I didn't have any issues. As soon as I patched my entire UI was glitching in and out all over and gave me tons of lag at seemingly random moments. I can't play a game that literally hurts to look at. I'm not the only one experiencing this either. I've seen other posts mentioning this exact issue. The only thing that has changed is the patch. Reinstalling as the guide says did nothing to fix this. How do I fix this?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I tweeted to @riotsupport about my issue, 
  My issue was that i was placed in low priority queue and the queue was reseting instead of taking me into the actual queue for a game and now I waited for 2 hours and its still reseting. Now 2 hours later and I'm still not in a game,I could've been done with my ban or have 1 game left by now smh. https://gyazo.com/b71c4a92e26abb8b86f74c477ffcd3b2
After relogging over 3 times and waiting over 2 hours 20 mins im finally ingame

So today I tried to open the client but I only see the logo displayed for a short while and after it disappears nothing is running. I reinstalled the game and after It started a repair. After that loaded I still had the same problem.
 I started it from different locations but it isn't even showing up on the task manager.
I dont have a super fast Internet speed (7 mb/s down) , but my client is updating a 76 kb/s and its a 3200 mb's left. why is the client updating so slow? its never been like this before.
i had this problem too !!
me to! 2,4K minutes update time xD

Hey, this patch is not that large unless your catching up on previous patches.  If not then your game files might be having some blocks preparing them for updates.  Sometimes a higher file size indicates the client trying to read your game files, so it erroneously reads it into the size of the update. 
 Double check your antivirus and OS settings to make sure access is being allowed properly, though our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help with that too.
when i in the game, it keep saying reconnect,i cant back to the game,it doesnt work when i click on reconnect
same here :(

I updated the game a few hours ago and when i started a game up i was losing a lot of frames, normally id get about 60 in game but after the patch i keep getting less than 10. It cant be my computer as i updated it a couple days ago.
